price: 39. Ir mėnulis, Mes nustatėme jam fazes, kol galiausiai jis grįžta kaip senas sudžiūvęs kreivas datulės stiebas.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
